Title: Purple Rain-Union
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Loren Bouchard, Nora Smith, Steven Davis (executive story editor), Kelvin Yu (executive story editor), Lizzie Molyneux (executive story editor), Wendy Molyneux (executive story editor), Holly Schlesinger (executive story editor)
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, Larry Murphy
Plot: Linda has an upcoming 25 year reunion at Cardinal Gennaro High. Debbie, chairman of the reunion, needs entertainment for the gala. Linda's old band, The Ta Tas, are not even her 3rd choice,...
